name: generate_video_prompt
description: Generate a cinematic Veo3 video prompt based on scene, lighting, emotion, and visual style.

scene_description.description: A specific scene to visualize (e.g., 'a girl sitting by a rainy window at 2AM')

camera_movement.description: Style of camera movement (e.g., slow pan, steadycam, zoom-in)

prompt_template: Cinematic video of {scene_description}, slow motion, dreamy atmosphere, soft lighting, midnight blue and deep purple color grading, moonlight yellow highlight, emotional, ultra-detailed, 16:9, UHD 4K, film still, directed by Wong Kar-wai style, camera movement {camera_movement}.
